00035 class ElemAttributeSet : public ElemUse
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00048     ElemAttributeSet (
00049             StylesheetConstructionContext&  constructionContext,
00050             Stylesheet&                     stylesheetTree,
00051             const AttributeListType&        atts,
00052             int                             lineNumber,
00053             int                             columnNumber);
00054 
00055     virtual
00056     ~ElemAttributeSet();
00057 
00063     const XalanQName&
00064     getQName() const
00065     {
00066         assert(m_qname != 0);
00067 
00068         return *m_qname;
00069     }
00070 
00071 
00072     // These methods are inherited from ElemUse ...
00073 
00074     virtual const XalanDOMString&
00075     getElementName() const;
00076 
00077 #if !defined(XALAN_RECURSIVE_STYLESHEET_EXECUTION)

00079     startElement(StylesheetExecutionContext&    executionContext) const;
00080 
00081     virtual void
00082     endElement(StylesheetExecutionContext&      executionContext) const;

00088     execute(StylesheetExecutionContext&     executionContext) const;
00089 #endif

00092     addToStylesheet(

00099     childTypeAllowed(int    xslToken) const;
00100 
00101 private:

00108 inline bool
00109 operator==(
00110             const ElemAttributeSet&     theLHS,
00111             const ElemAttributeSet&     theRHS)
00112 {
00113     return theLHS.getQName() == theRHS.getQName();
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 
00118 inline bool
00119 operator<(
00120             const ElemAttributeSet&     theLHS,
00121             const ElemAttributeSet&     theRHS)
00122 {
00123     return theLHS.getQName() < theRHS.getQName();
00124 }
